rules.description: F23/F24 to ersatz Super in Emacs

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "iTerm2" to create window with default profile'

rules.description: Browsers: Caps Lock to back on single press, Control on press and hold.
Spotify: Caps Lock to back on single press, Control on press and hold.
Caps Lock to Escape on single press, Control on press and hold.
Return to Control on press and hold.
Better Shifting: Parentheses on shift keys
